name: Out of control: Drone Uprising
description:
A small 3D FPS game made for the GMTK 2020 game jam . The game features a small apocalyptic town where the installation of new radio towers have driven drones out of control.  Play as Alex who has taken it upon himself to sabotage the radio towers to rescue his town. Armed with nothing but a shotgun you battle against out of control drones that tries to attack you. I would have liked to include more enemy types, but due to the project being made for a two day game jam I did not have time for that.

To play the game just download the folder by clicking on the Download button. When the folder has finished downloading find it in your Downloads folder and unzip it.  Inside the folder you will find the Executable file (the one with the yellowish icon) just double click it and the game will launch.

Game made with Unity.

Sound from zapsplat.com

Textures from textures.com

All models made in blender 2.8 for this game (no marketplace models used).
